item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Broadway Bistro - on Broadway over on the West Side, a couple of blocks up from Route 95 - look for the black lab on the side of the building.

I keep driving by this place when I'm going over to the West Side and thinking....... that looks cute, we should go there. I've stopped by, peeked in the windows, checked the times and hey - they're open Monday night! It looks appropriately "bistro" with twinkle lights, a long black bar with lots of bead board with matching Thonet-style chairs and tables. Check out the website - it looks good! I think this might be a good one to know about. So, If you've ever driven by and said "Hey I need to check that one out"......here's your chance.

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a blue messenger bag with me, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Broadway Bistro!
